name: LOVE IN OLETUS
description:
'' LOVE IN OLETUS '' is an Identity V dating sim fangame.

A new survivor is invited... and that's YOU!
Join the fun in Oletus Manor and have the chance to win the hearts of survivors AND hunters.

FREE TO DOWNLOAD AND PLAY!
